TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: Aaahhhhhhhhhhhhggggg! I fell asleep and missed my date!

While I cannot deny any homicidal impulses, I can state that I do not feel any towards participants in this thread.

Road trips... fun... What is this nonsense!

Actually, I can't complain too much. The last time was pretty good. Wifi, electrical plugs, fun texts from people. And I had the row to myself from Sudbury home! The time before that... ugh. Two screaming children, for all but the last... I dunno, 90 minutes? of the trip, crowded bus and starting right after my final exam, when I was already tired and cranky.

Many people in this thread have homicidal impulses, some more than others...

At least you don't have to guide on your trips, when I went on holiday I had to guide my mother everywhere each time we went out in the car.
I've actually tried the 28 hour day, and it worked quite well. It only becomes problematic when your job requires you to get there the same couple of hours every day.

Many people in this thread have homicidal impulses, some more than others...

At least you don't have to guide on your trips, when I went on holiday I had to guide my mother everywhere each time we went out in the car.

Homicidal impulses? Me? Don't be silly!

*involuntarily whacks Leon with rebar*

Sorry.

Homicidal impulses? Me? Don't be silly!

*involuntarily whacks Leon with rebar*

Sorry.

When I enter this thread I always wear a suit of plate armour with a bullet proof vest underneath.

And I have now placed you rebar in a Tsar Bomba and I have a remote control for its activation.

Many people in this thread have homicidal impulses, some more than others...

At least you don't have to guide on your trips, when I went on holiday I had to guide my mother everywhere each time we went out in the car.

Dad drives, mom navigates. Then they bicker because mom has to keep switching glasses and thus misses the turnoffs and dad can't read a map, even though he was a Scout Leader. Getting my first MP3 player was a godsend, let me tell you... Then they got a GPS, and dad bickers with it.

Dad drives, mom navigates. Then they bicker because mom has to keep switching glasses and thus misses the turnoffs and dad can't read a map, even though he was a Scout Leader. Getting my first MP3 player was a godsend, let me tell you... Then they got a GPS, and dad bickers with it.

Oh lord, my mother is HORRIBLE at navigation. I swear the GPS says to turn and she refuses to understand that it means THAT TURN RIGHT NOW!

Leon, you dare take my rebar.

My mother is forced to agree with me on all things of navigation as I have never gotten us lost and the one time she didn't listen to me we did get lost

And yes I did, but you can have it back if you control your murderous impulses.

Pleeeeease? *glowing robotic puppy eyes*

This wont work.
And Now for Something Completely Different... JalapeÃƒÂ±o - Anyone like?
Oh yes, me love! People always say that my cooking too spicy and hot to eat, but I say they're fools. Food was MEANT to be spicy!

People always say that my cooking too spicy and hot to eat, but I say they're fools.

Once people where suggesting that my food don't need reheating next day, because You can't tell the difference anyway .
You can build up a resistance to spicy foods like poison or alcohol till eating a raw JalapeÃƒÂ±o wouldn't effect you. That would be weird.

Once people where suggesting that my food don't need reheating next day, because You can't tell the difference anyway .

Whoever suggested that is crazy. Like left over pizza; its utterly disgusting cold, but almost like new when reheated. Almost.
Shut it Rage. Cold pizzia is tastey!
So would you still love pizza eating it outside the Amundsen-Scott station?

Shut it Rage. Cold pizzia is tastey!

You're like my sister. I know we can agree that fresh pizza is best though.
I am a FIEND, both for spicy foods and pizza. Only pepperoni pizza is good cold, though. Too many other toppings do strange things when cooked and chilled.

Old pizza suck no matter how You will treat it (better eat cold than microwaved), even slowly delivered phone pizza taste different (especially when guy put box into plastic bag and keep one hour in a car... it happens ).

Edited May 29, 2013 by karolus10

I am a FIEND, both for spicy foods and pizza. Only pepperoni pizza is good cold, though. Too many other toppings do strange things when cooked and chilled.

If they start jumping off the pizza and dancing then that's not normal. You need to check them then.

You all are being monitored.

(0.(0.(0.0).0).0)

That is all.
You are now breathing manually.
Your pizza toppings are now jumping of the pizza and dancing in front of you.

random update: im making a mod

WHY MOD WHY ARE YOU SO COMPLEX ALL I WANT IS A NICE LITTLE WORKING MU FILE BUT NOOOOO ALL YOU GIVE ME A DAE FILES AND BROKEN MUs I WANT KILL MYSELF RIGHT NOW

You are now under the influence of a powerful anysthetic. In 3...2...1...
